attributes.action: Resign MP's who want a proxy war
attributes.background: All members of parliament who support a proxy war with russia or any other nation or country to resign immediately and put such actions to the nation for a vote first, this will ensure the democratic will of the uk.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to resign are a matter for individual MPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
